column5: Five star, sophisticated, elegant decor by well known interior designer. Four bedroom, four and a half bath transitional interior with travertine flooring, fully furnished kitchen, beautiful linens, spacious bedroom accommodations, 3.2 miles from Hobby Airport, Concrete pad for helo landing. This property is a privately secured, fenced business owner's residence available for mature guests only. Private security on site 24/7. Absolutely no smoking.
